resources.string: Welcome you to Honki de Nihongo app
Click the icon ä¸‰ on the upper left side of the screen to start to learn Japanese.\n\nPlease select the learning content from the Lesson List.
Profile
Username: The account name is displayed in form of user \'s name in the app.\nUser Code: The code is used in another service and data management.\nEmail: The mail address which was registered.
Menu

Dashboard: Confirm the learning time in the past. Learn as planned.
Lesson List: Select Unit. Units are corresponding to Minna no Nihongo textbook.
Profile: Registration information of users. The User Code will be used in another service.
Setting: Users can select language. Select to display/hide this pop-up explanation.
About Us: The information about the version, Terms of Service.
Logout: Logging out of the app.
How to learn Unit

1. In Word and Sentence parts of Basic level, users will learn basic vocabularies and sentences.\n2. In Word and Sentence parts of Advance level, users will learn vocabularies and sentences commonly used in Japanese daily life and working environment.\n3. When finishing learning words and sentences of Basic level, users can practice quickly answering in Trial part.
How to learn Practice part

1. Look at Japanese to practice answering according to Vietnamese meaning.
2. Look at Vietnamese to practice answering in Japanese.
3. Listen to Japanese sound to practice answering in Japanese.
4. Listen to Japanese sound to practice answering according toVietnamese meaning.
Ranking of User
Make effort to achieve high ranking with the score calculated according to the correct answers and answer time.
How to use Flashcard of Word

The front side of the flashcard is in form of Japanese, the back side is in form of Vietnamese. Moreover, users can confirm by sound.

All: Check all vocabularies from the beginning to the end.
Notes: For remembered words, flip to the left; flip to the right for unremembered ones, or words which users want to check again.
How to use Flashcard of Sentence

The front side of the flashcard is in form of Japanese, the back side is in form of Vietnamese. Moreover, users can confirm by sound.

All: Check all of sentences from the beginning to the end.
Notes: For remembered sentences, flip to the left; flip to the right for unremembered ones, or sentences which users want to check again.
Explanation of Word
When tapping a word, users can see explanation flashcard of that word.
Explanation of Sentence
When tapping a sentence, users can see explanation flashcard of that sentence.
Setting
Language: Please select the language to explain the app.\n\nHelp: Please select to display/hide the explanation pop-up in each page.
How to learn Word part

1. Knowledge: Confirm user \'s knowledge by using list of words and their explanations.\n2. Flashcard: Use flashcards to practice new words effectively.\n3. Practice: Confirm user \'s understanding with 3 choices.
How to learn Sentence part

1. Grammar: Confirm grammar parts which will be practiced in this unit.(only available for Basic level)
2. Knowledge: Confirm user 's knowledge by using list of sentences and their explanations.
3. Flashcard: Use flashcards to practice new sentences effectively.
4. Practice: Confirm user 's understanding with 3 choices.
How to learn Trial part

Practice answering 60 questions quickly; in word and sentence part of Basic level, there are 3 choices for each question.Try to select a large number of correct answers in the shortest time to get the high score.
Grammar
This has function of explaining the grammar structures learned in the unit.\nTap items to confirm detail explanation.
Ranking of team
Day Ranking and Week Ranking of Trial part.\nMake effort to achieve the highest Ranking with the score calculated based on the correct answers and answer time.
